A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched it on a GTX Extreme screen. This only made the narrative and character flaws worse. There was a lot of work and talent put into the sets and visuals. Unfortunately\, it is filled with fumbles of the narrative\, pacing\, and character development. It is like a dog turn filled with chocolate chips. There are good parts but they are not worth eating the rest of the dish. Anyone with stock in Disney should be mad at them for squandering the Star Wars IP. The movie should be rewritten and refilmed. It stifles marketability of current and future products. Like a tumor\, it has made other products less appealing. This was someone's first Star Wars movie. I doubt it will even remain a popular movie to torrent. Its not worth the space.
